locations: University Of Central Florida - 4000 Central Florida Boulevard, Orlando, Florida, USA::(UCF Arena)
imdb.plot outline: Combat Fighting Championships (Combat FC) is one of the premier Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) competitions in the United States. Providing the sporting world with a look and feel that is consistent with major league sports, Combat FC has created a brand that will not fade with time. Combat FC is an upscale, ESPN/NFL-style production with relevant, in-depth commentary, and a clean graphics package. Utilizing a thirty-foot fenced-in ring, Combat FC events are fought in an arena and are much like Las Vegas' black-tie boxing events.
imdb.title: Combat Fighting Championships
